summary: After the death of his beloved wife a man begins to fall apart mentally, having dreadful nightmares and finding his family and career affected. As time goes on, he begins to rapidly slip away.
cast: Thomas Hedengran|Peter Stormare|Tintin Anderzon|Sandra Larsson|Dylan M. Johansson|Viktoria Sätter|Helena Löwenmark|Gudrun Mickelsson|Patrik Andersson|Maria Bergsten|Peter Boija|Jonathan Bonin|Stella Edling|Kerstin Hansson|Tim Netzler|Linus Persson|Saga Viljeståhl
keywords: character name as title|forename as title|eastern europe|nightmare|folklore
title: Marianne
